author: zhaobenny
description: AI user powered by OpenAI, replies randomly to messages in a cynical manner and can read text from images to reply to. (Requires OpenAI API key and Tessaract OCR install)
install_msg: Set OpenAI key using [p]set api openai api_key,INSERT_API_KEY and [p]ai_user add CHANNEL_ID to whitelist channels for the bot to start replying
